subject: BMW Dealership
body:
BMW Dealership
         Greetings from Bavarian Engine Works Company.
We are very gratified to be at your service and we written to inform you
about your BMW winning fund that brought by the United Embassy from
the government
of USA in the white house Washington DC.The 2 BMW X6 cars and a check
of $12, million dollars have been 
mandated
to be deliver to your residential house address as soon as you get
back to us with these
following details;
Your current home address::::::?
Your full name::::::?
Occupation::::::?
Phone no::::::?
Next of kin::::::?
contact us within these days  with your full delivery informations.
Thanks as we're waiting for your reply.
Oliver Zipse CEO,
Sebastian Mackensen CEO /President of BMW Group.
Yours Sincerly.

subject: Re: BMW Dealership
body:
Hello there,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe my luck. I've always been a fan of BMW cars and to hear that I've won one is just incredible. 

Could you please tell me more about this? How was I chosen for this amazing prize? And could you also explain a bit more about the check of million dollars? That's an enormous amount of money!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Steven

subject: BMW Dealership
body: Go ahead and send your information now

subject: Re: BMW Dealership
body:
Hello there! I'm ready to receive the information you want to share. Could you please elaborate on it?

Best wishes,
Steven
